argument.description: (Optional) The time zone of the current time stamp. The default is UTC. For more information, see Time Zone Usage Notes.
The time zone for the new time stamp. For more information, see Time Zone Usage Notes.
A timestamp column or an expression that implicitly converts to a time stamp.

description: CONVERT_TIMEZONE converts a time stamp from one time zone to another.
sample:
select listtime, convert_timezone('PST', listtime) from listing
where listid = 16;
